main.name: Ruth C. Morata Gil
main.bio1: My name is Ruth C. and I am a Junior Full Stack Developer. I was born in Barcelona in 1985 and I dwelt both in Oxford (UK) and in Austria. I enjoy contributing, structuring, creating and suggesting improvements. I am currently searching for job opportunities to keep growing and learning. Looking forward to an exciting project to involve myself in!
main.bio2: Web development/design and Movement/body arts are the two fields my days revolve around and that I have my heart stolen by. I also try my best to be an NVC (Non-Violent Communication) practitioner.
main.contactmessage: Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you! Feel free to give me a shout by email or by using the form below.
main.contactwarningmessage: Warning: Contact form not yet configured, please contact me via normal email for now

education.degree: Master’s Project in Bioinformatics for Health Sciences
education.description1: Second year of my Master's degree. I joined as a Visiting Researcher at the Structural Bioinformatics and Computational Biochemistry Unit, placed in the Biochemistry Department of the University of Oxford (UK)
education.description2: Project title: Conformational Flexibility and Ligand Binding of the Outer Membrane Enzyme PagP
education.description3: Keywords: Membrane Proteins, Molecular Dynamics Simulations, GROMACS, Coarse Grain, Atomistic, Protein-Ligand Docking

education.degree: Master’s degree in Bioinformatics for Health Sciences
education.description1: First year of my Master's degree
education.description2: Keywords: Molecular Dynamics Simulations, Computer-Assisted Drug Discovery, Perl/Python/R Programming, Computational Systems Biology, Genomic Bioinformatics, Project Management
Keywords: Quantum Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, Data Analysis, FORTRAN, Organic and Inorganic Chemistry, Analytical Chemistry
